meanings.definition: To make a mistake in executing a shot in billiards or another game.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he miscued his shot and missed the target.
meanings.sent2: She often miscued her shots when playing pool with friends.
meanings.sent3: The player miscued so badly that the ball went in the wrong direction!
meanings.sent4: Her miscued shot was like a wild arrow veering off course.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the miscued shot echoed in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: To give an incorrect cue to an actor in a play.
meanings.sent1: The director miscued the actor, causing confusion on stage.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally miscued the lead actor during the crucial scene.
meanings.sent3: The miscued cue made the actor perform a funny dance instead.
meanings.sent4: Her miscued line threw off the entire scene like a misplaced puzzle piece.
meanings.sent5: The audience chuckled at the miscued line delivered by the actor.

meanings.definition: To misinterpret or misunderstand a situation.
meanings.sent1: She often miscued social cues and ended up in awkward situations.
meanings.sent2: He miscued the instructions and ended up lost in the city.
meanings.sent3: The miscued message led to a hilarious mix-up between friends.
meanings.sent4: Her miscued understanding of the situation was like seeing a mirage.
meanings.sent5: The miscued plan resulted in chaos and confusion among the team.
